regex.name: dir
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jaylex32/Enoch-addon/master/Movies.xml'): from resources.lib.modules import control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.Enoch': return from resources.lib.indexers import phstreams phstreams.indexer().get(url)
